backend/main.mo: Core LandCanister actor implementing land NFT minting, management, tokenomics with claim/upgrade systems, loot caches, modifications, and access control with authorized admin principal.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Step-by-step guide for performing a forced full reinstall of Land and Asset Canisters on IC mainnet, including backup procedures and re-initialization steps with documented canister IDs.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Pre-deployment checklist for CyberGenesis requiring environment configuration with a .env file in the frontend directory.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Comprehensive mainnet deployment guide covering prerequisites, deployment sequence for all five canisters, and 3D model asset setup with dfx CLI instructions.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Critical environment configuration instructions for deploying all five canisters in the correct order.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Complete developer documentation covering the multi-canister architecture (LandCanister, CyberTokenCanister, MarketplaceCanister, GovernanceCanister, AssetCanister), inter-canister communication, and project status as audit-ready.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide for critical environment variables required in frontend/.env, including network configuration settings.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide for resolving Asset Canister ID and canister availability errors through proper environment variable configuration and backend canister deployment.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence map configuration features for MapView.tsx: Golden Archive projection setup, ImageLayer webp configuration, and cinematic drone entry animation parameters.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Detailed summaries of all frontend components including MapView with Maptalks.js Golden Archive configuration, Dashboard with conditional mounting, 3D visualization components, and Russian language UI throughout.
frontend/.env: Production environment configuration permanently set to IC mainnet with all five canister IDs, admin authorization principal, network stability settings (120s timeouts, 25 retries), and multi-gateway failover configuration.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variables template with network configuration, all five canister IDs, Internet Identity URL, stability settings, admin principal, and debug mode flag with examples for local and mainnet deployment.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration, and root div mounting the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that manages authentication flow, actor initialization, profile setup, and displays landing/dashboard pages with cosmic/particle backgrounds and reinitialization progress handling.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the asset backend canister interface, including Asset, UserProfile, UserRole types and all asset management, admin, and user profile methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory definition for the asset backend canister, specifying service methods for asset management, access control, user profiles, and administrative functions.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the main backend canister, defining types and service methods for land management, token claims, loot caches, modifiers, upgrades, and HTTP transformations.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin component for uploading GLB 3D models to specific land types with authorization checks, asset canister health verification, file validation, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel component with asset canister health monitoring, land type selection, GLB file upload interface with validation, and periodic health checks every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Comprehensive diagnostics tool that runs 8 tests on asset canister health including actor initialization, network connectivity, authentication, queries, permissions, cycle balance, and inter-canister communication with detailed logging.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: React component for reinitializing the Asset Canister with admin authorization checks, pre/post health checks, and a multi-step reinitialization process with status tracking.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Diagnostic tool that tests canister connectivity across multiple IC gateways, measures response times, and generates health reports with recommendations for Land and Asset canisters.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: UI component that verifies and displays the correctness of configured canister IDs (Land, Cyber Token, Asset, Marketplace, Governance) against expected values from environment variables.
Validation component that checks for required environment variables (canister IDs, network config) and displays critical errors or warnings in a prominent banner with quick-fix instructions.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Animated 2D canvas background rendering a cosmic scene with twinkling stars and pulsing nebulae using non-WebGL rendering for visual atmosphere.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: React Three Fiber component that renders a 3D scene with biome-specific GLTF models, dynamic lighting, bloom post-processing, and an animated FBM shader background sphere with neon colors.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file; all 3D rendering logic has been moved to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Health monitoring dashboard that checks LandCanister and AssetCanister status, displays operational state with icons, and provides manual refresh functionality with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: UI for discovering and processing loot caches with tiered costs (CBR tokens and charge), displays cache inventory, and handles discovery/processing mutations with error handling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches component errors and displays a styled error notification with optional custom fallback and error callback.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Governance interface for staking CBR tokens, creating proposals, and voting on active proposals with validation, mutation handling, and formatted balance displays.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Dashboard for managing land plots with reward claiming (24h cooldown timer), plot upgrades, modifier application, and admin debug tools for token balances.
File appears to be empty or contains only whitespace.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: React Three Fiber component that loads and renders GLTF land models with KTX2 texture support, applying biome-specific lighting configurations, PBR materials with emissive maps, anisotropic filtering, and dynamic camera fitting with pulsing emissive effects.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: UI component for navigating between owned land plots with previous/next buttons, displaying the current land's name, biome type in Russian, and position in the collection.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays the top 10 land plots ranked by token balance with special styling for top 3 positions, showing plot name, upgrade level, and CBR token balance.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive map component using Maptalks.js library loaded via CDN, displaying all land plots with biome-colored markers, custom projections, and user-owned land highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace interface for buying, selling, and listing land plots and modifiers with filtering by type and price, displaying active listings and managing user's own listings with cancel functionality.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Network monitoring component that performs periodic health checks against the Asset Canister, displaying connection status, latency metrics, uptime, and consecutive failure counts with expandable diagnostics panel.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders an animated 2D canvas background with moving particles and connecting lines using requestAnimationFrame. Handles window resize and cleanup of animation frames on unmount.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: Provides a UI card for customizing land plot names (max 20 chars) and decoration URLs. Uses React Query mutations to update plot data and displays loading states during updates.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Displays a wallet connection button that shows truncated principal ID when connected and provides a dropdown menu for copying the full principal or disconnecting. Handles connecting/disconnecting states with loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a profile setup form for new users to enter their name and create a profile. Uses React Query mutation to save the profile and displays toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Displays a full-screen modal showing connection reinitialization progress with attempt count, current gateway, and animated progress bar. Used during network reconnection attempts.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: React error boundary that catches and logs 3D rendering errors without crashing the canvas. Displays a fallback UI with error details and a retry button when errors occur.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Defines mainnet configuration for ICP deployment including canister IDs, asset URLs, model filenames by tier, and feature flags. Provides initialization and validation functions for the mainnet setup.
React context provider for Plug Wallet integration, managing connection state, principal authentication, and actor creation for Internet Computer canisters.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Static catalog of 45+ placeholder game modifiers organized by rarity tiers (1-4), each with id, name, rarity, and asset URL properties.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for governance backend interface including proposals, voting, staking operations, and their result types.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory definition for governance backend service, specifying all method signatures and data structures for Internet Computer canister communication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Hook providing automatic actor reinitialization with gateway rotation across multiple IC endpoints, implementing retry logic with progressive delays up to 3 attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Hook that wraps useActor with initialization polling logic, validating backend connectivity through multiple health checks with progressive backoff up to 25 retries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated Actor for the Asset Canister with automatic gateway failover (ic0.app, boundary.ic0.app, icp-api.io), health checks, retry logic (25 attempts with exponential backoff), and environment validation. Integrates with Internet Identity for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: React hook that monitors Asset Canister health by fetching the /health endpoint with a 1-second delay and 3-second timeout, returning status as 'checking', 'healthy', or 'error'.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: React hook for uploading GLB files to the Asset Canister using Plug wallet authentication. Reads files as ArrayBuffer, converts to byte array, and calls uploadLandModel with progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated Actor for the Governance Canister with automatic gateway failover, 120-second timeout, and retry logic (25 attempts). Integrates with Internet Identity for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence in local storage, delegation validation, and configurable AuthClient options with idle handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Creates and manages an authenticated Actor for the Marketplace Canister with automatic gateway failover (ic0.app, boundary.ic0.app, icp-api.io), 120-second timeout, and retry logic (25 attempts). Integrates with Internet Identity for authentication.
Provides React Query hooks for Plug Wallet transactions across token, marketplace, and governance canisters, including buying/listing items, staking tokens, and voting on proposals with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder types for governance proposals and marketplace listings with retry logic and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Creates and manages a token canister actor with automatic gateway failover across multiple IC endpoints, retry logic (up to 25 attempts), and 120-second timeout handling for both local and mainnet environments.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with cyberpunk-themed dark mode colors, Orbitron/JetBrains Mono fonts, glassmorphism effects, and neon glow utilities for cyan, green, purple, and yellow text/box shadows.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build timestamp and version information for cache busting, providing functions to append version query parameters to URLs and log deployment metadata on app initialization.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Provides debug logging utilities for 3D scene components with GPU context diagnostics, WebGL renderer detection, canvas overlap detection, and scene stability testing activated via environment variables or query parameters.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: File content is truncated; likely handles 3D model loading utilities for Three.js/R3F components based on project context.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Utility functions for ICRC-1 token handling with 8 decimal places, including formatting balances to human-readable strings, parsing decimal amounts to base units (bigint), adding thousands separators, and checking sufficient balance for transactions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root React component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for marketplace backend canister interface, including Listing type, ItemType enum (Land/Modifier), BuyResult variant, and marketplace methods for listing, buying, and querying items.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory definition for marketplace backend service, defining the interface types and methods for marketplace operations.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Collection page component displaying a catalog of modifiers with tier-based styling (Common, Rare, Legendary, Mythic), showing counts per tier and rendering modifier cards with rarity-specific visual effects.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard component with tabbed navigation (Land, Discovery, Collection, Leaderboard, Marketplace, Governance, Map) that manages land selection and displays the appropriate view based on active tab.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with cosmic/particle backgrounds that prompts users to connect via Internet Identity, displaying login status and error messages with animated visual effects.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Minting page that shows loading state while initializing land data and actor, displaying success message once complete.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Verification page for checking canister ID configuration with CanisterIDVerification component and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for ICRC-1 token backend canister, including Account, TransferArgs, TransferError/Result types, and methods for balance queries, transfers, minting, and access control.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining ICRC-1 token interface with Account, TransferArgs, TransferError types and methods for balance_of, transfer, metadata, total_supply, and mint operations.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for WebGPU API including GPU, GPUAdapter, GPUDevice, GPUQueue interfaces and related types for WebGPU feature detection and usage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration and parameter cleanup functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with sidebar/chart colors, custom shadows including neon effects, and accordion animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration with React plugin, environment variable injection, build timestamp for cache busting, proxy setup for local API, COOP/COEP headers, and special handling for WASM/basis_transcoder assets.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a 3D map viewer with Maptalks identity projection, drone-like kinetic physics, cinematic camera controls, and detailed configuration for coordinate system, viewport, and UI markers.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment guide providing overview, requirements, and quick start instructions for the CyberGenesis DApp.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Bash script that uploads all .glb 3D model files from ./assets/models to the AssetCanister on ICP mainnet with rate limiting and verification. Provides stable URLs in format https://[canister-id].raw.ic0.app/[filename].glb for production use.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Bash script for batch uploading 48 3D model files (12 per tier across 4 tiers) to AssetCanister, with base64 encoding, verification, and URL generation for uploaded assets.
unknown.txt: Fragment containing only a numbered list item '5. **Test health endpoint:**' with no additional context or content.
